description:
Ivan Zell is the father of http://anidb.net/ch88516 [Nonna Zell] and was killed upon http://anidb.net/ch88517 [Riku Dola] and his battalion finding out the secret dwarven facility. He is skilled in territory surveillance and has a keen mind in situations that require decisions to be made in an instant. He was killed by a Demonia, and did so by Riku`s command in order to save the colony. He entrusted his daughter and the future of the colony upon Riku as a goodbye. He was given a statue within the newly formed Elchea square. Little else is known about him.
Source: No Game No Life Wiki
name: Ivan Zell
